sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import "./Feedback.css"; export const Feedback = () => { return (

Feel the love

from our happy customers.

Amazing service and incredible fast delivery!!!

I ordered it for my fiance's birthday and he love it so much, infact he is obsessed with it. amazing product, good quality. Worth it, Thanks guys!!!

by Octavio

A very good buy

I gifted these and Harry Potter pocket watch to a friend of mine. He loved it! Thanks for making gifting quirky, creative , interesting and exciting at the same time!❣️P.S.: The gifts look amazing in magical setting!

by Dare

A perfect gift for arsenal fans

The product is exactly as shown. Good quality and finish. Was impressed with the speed of delivery. very happy with this purchase

by Dare

Amazing after sale service!

I purchased the product as a gift for my GOT crazy friend and had it delivered directly to his residence. Upon receipt of the product he informed me that a few components of the box were missing. I immediately contacted the support team at bigsmall.in and they were more than helpful. Within 6 hours they opened a new box, sent pictures and confirmed whether all the components were present. Within the next 24 hours, the old, incomplete box was replaced with a new complete one. the game itself is amazing for any GOT fan and a must have!

I hope you are always successful.

{" "} Thank you for your services and support.

by Amir Javad

Great gift for a football fan!

I had bought the colour wooden crest version as a gift for my boyfriend's birthday and he really loved it! The material and the colour were of top notch level. They also gave me options for viewing the real time picture. Overall loved the product and the ease of the order process.

by Bernhard

); };
